title: When you dodge the enemies ult using pure, unmatched skill

replies.body: Nah man that ain't dodging. What you gotta do is get them to completely miss you but flash into it at the last second. Then you gotta come on the league boards and complain about how unbalanced Lux is.
Your name is impeccable.
she is
Buy boots.
That's not the point wtf.

If you knew how to play the game, you wouldn't spew such nonsensical bullshit.

"Lux is OP" top kek.
silver for 3 seasons comes with nonsense arguments like "if you knew how to play blah blah". why am i not surprised?
The number of ranked games I've played over the 4 years of LoL, can account for barely 40 games, ayy lmao git gud kiddo.
yeah and every season expect 4 you had a negative winrate, you clearly belong there

Yes, 40 ranked games over all those years are big enough of a sample to judge my skill at the game, especially when you're neck deep in the trolling/feeding/afking cancer that is Gold1 to Bronze5. A friend of mine had 200 ranked games THIS YEAR ALONE and made it to Gold2, I am clearly bad.

Ayyy lmao. I'd rather uninstall that play anything meta, so that I can win games despite having to play with/against wankers like you. Nah thanks, I'd rather lose and improve on the champions I actually like.
it.. kind of is.. i've played 57 and i climbed from silver iv to high silver ii in two weeks sooooo...

-57 games and climed 2 divisions in two weeks.

-Barely 40 games ACROSS 4 seasons.

Yeah, those two are very similar. Learn to read, thank you.
what i'm saying is that maybe if you actually tried you'd go somewhere :)

Admittedly I just realized I mistook your reply for Remikaze, and replied to you thinking you where him.

I revoked my downvote, sorry for the misconception. Damn, I should learn to read lel.

haha, hope you learned something :D was just sharing my experience, sorry for butting in. i think you could easily hit silver or gold if you tried- i never did much ranked either because i was too afraid of being pushed further down bronze. now im pretty confident i'll hit gold next season :)
you're still on the "i lost the argument since post 1, so now i'm spamming insults to make me look like i'm superior"-train. pathetic, won't even bother with this anymore. let's move on.
Ironhold pretty much only knows how to insult people. Nobody even said lux was op except as an obvious joke but he's gotta come in here and start crying.

i don't think she's broken, i'm just annoyed how safe she is for all she got. she's so safe that mejais is a core item on her, should tell people something. she was fine before, these buffs people on these forums cried for and partially other things were just unnecessary. oh i'm waiting for the day someone who's popular here actually points that out and then all the sheep start a circlejerk just to get upvotes too, that's gotta be interesting. it's always like that, someone who makes a good point complains about essence reaver, suddenly 5 more threads pop up with barely any content that complain about essence reaver too. someone complains about champion xy, suddenly everyone thinks said champion is broken. this forums are worse than reddit.

Wow that's spectacular toxicity right here.

So spitefull infact, you have to come and randomly spew insults in a topic you have absolutelly no place in. Just because I rustled your american jimmies in another topic. Damn son, that's some next level self-entitlement right here, I'm not even mad.
I bet you even downvoted my posts.

I wouldn't be surprise if you make your sole occupation downvoting me for the longest time possible.

PS. What you call "an obvious joke" has been debunked by his reply, he was pretty much serious. Lastly, sarcasm is kinda hard if not impossible to discern through written text, it always helps when you clarify it with like (sarcasm) or "/s" at the end of your post.

"It's all skill!"

-{{champion:81}}

No no no, this is how you do it.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aPg4hnm5mRU&feature=youtu.be
I take pleasure in watching this.
Why the hell would he give the kill?
Either he was trolling or he was trying to preemptively dodge the rocket but because Jinx was aiming behind his turret (Where she likely thought he was) he ended up going right into it.

Jinx and company Approve

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
you forgot nunu {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
i had to watch 20 times to understand wtf just happened
https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/615768292926423040/sZImFnbw_400x400.png
This pleases me IMMENSLY.
That was fantastic
I'm so pro, I can dodge {{champion:16}} ult
By dying before it goes off. Report {{champion:16}}
I can use Zhonya's to dodge point and click ults like Kayle's.
Or just be yasuo and never get hit with anything!!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

>
> Or just be yasuo and never get hit with anything!!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Oops got hit with something...
But wait! I have my passive!
FULL HEALTH! :D

>
> Or just be yasuo and never get hit with anything!!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

WIND WALLS DON'T BLOCK LAZORS
So many minions available am I right? Becuase dashing into Luxes just makes you melt faster
http://cdn.makeagif.com/media/10-16-2015/D5bD--.gif
He said it was going to be a bad time. Never smiled so much in my life.

Is this the undertale phenomenon that seems to have spread everywhere? 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Or just play {{champion:23}}  and press R. Kappa
The last laser would have hit me so fking hard but it just went through that guy :l

Matrix {{champion:81}} confirmed:

http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view3/4625626/matrix-bullet-o.gif

should have seen me when i was playing shaco
i was completely surrounded at 50hp left
i dodged a lux q, a lux e, a lux ult, a jinx w, a jinx rocket, a vi q, a fiora, and a zed shuriken

> [{quoted}](name=2000boxes,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=GUarn9Hs,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-17T00:40:50.717+0000)
>
> should have seen me when i was playing shaco
> i was completely surrounded at 50hp left
> i dodged a lux q, a lux e, a lux ult, a jinx w, a jinx rocket, a vi q, a fiora, and a zed shuriken

All by pressing a single Q.

almost
i dodged the lux q e and ult by skill full strafing
i dodged the jinx rocket by also strafing
the only abilities i dodged with my q were the fiora and vi q
everything else was by paying close attention and walking out of the way at the last second

Thats just Ezreal doing his thing.
(As a Lux player,they **ALL** aimed badly.)
{{champion:105}} AHAHAHAHAHA
